definition: to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow

sentences.english: The name of the city area can not be used as a separate enterprise in the name of the administrative division.
sentences.chinese: 市轄區的名稱不能單獨用作企業名稱中的行政區劃。

sentences.english: A name of a district under a city may not be used separately as the administrative division in an enterprise name.
sentences.chinese: 市轄區的名稱不能單獨用作企業名稱中的行政區劃。

sentences.english: The water pollution sources in Fushun city were investigated in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 於2002年對撫順市轄區內水污染源進行了調查。

definition: Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
Lufeng county level city in Shanwei 汕尾, Guangdong
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
White area (area controlled by the KMT during the Second Revolutionary War 1927-1937)
